item.title: GDB and SuperCollider plugins
item.description: We will assume that you already have SuperCollider running and that you have booted the server. Now you’d like to attach the GDB debugger to that process to see what happens when / if it crashes. Attach GDB to an already running scsynth process First, we need to find the pid of the running process: ps -C scsynth -o pid h Then, we can use the number output from the command above to attach gdb:
